story.text: Jan 3 Trans World Entertainment Corp. (TWMC.O) reported a 6 percent decline in same-store sales for the five-week period ended Dec. 30, 2006 and cut its fiscal 2006 earnings estimates on lower-than-expected sales for the holiday season. The company lowered its 2006 earnings forecast to a range of flat to 5 cents a share from its earlier view of 10 cents to 20 cents a share, the music, video and video game retailer said in a statement. (Reporting by Dilipp S. Nag in Bangalore)
story.title: trans world posts lower dec . sales , cuts ' 06 earnings view
